definitions.body: pure, clear: [[בר לבב]] pure in heart Ps 24:4; [[ברי לבב]] Ps 73:1; a pure damsel Ct So 6:9, So 6:10, man Job 11:4, commands of God Ps 19:9.
clean: [[אֵבוּס בָּר]] crib is clean Pr 14:4.
perh. adv. [[נַשְּׁקו־בַר]] kiss purely, of sincere homage Ps 2:12 but cf. I. [[בַּר]], p. 135.
